Class Coin

  • java.lang.Object
    • coinmachine.Coin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Coin>

    public class Coin
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Coin>
    A Coin represents metalic money with a value.
